bug_report.summary: When clicking on the 'A to Z' filtering button on the main page of the application, chaotic filtering of lists occurs
bug_report.step_to_reproduce: <1> О1. Open the 'Notes' app </1> <2> 2. Create 15 lists that will start accordingly (A, a, D, 3, :, U, u, Ш, ш, 5, @, Ї, ї, -, d) </2> <3> 3. On the main page of the application, click on the filter button 'A to Z' </3>
bug_report.expected_result: <1> The lists are sorted in order: symbols, numbers, Latin letters (upper case first), Cyrillic letters (upper case first) </1> <2> Correct order : (-, :, @, 3, 5, А, а, D, d, U, u, Ї, ї, Ш, ш) </2>
bug_report.author: Vitaly
